name: Awesome Donut Ice Cream Cake Breakfast Shop Maker
name_original: Awesome Donut Ice Cream Cake Breakfast Shop Maker
description:
We present to you, a cop's favorite food to eat, or even one of your favorite baked desserts, DONUTS!!

Brought to you by Top Crazy Games, bringing you the best cooking and baking game with all of your favorite donut flavors and recipes. Play and make your own today!

Features:
- Ring Donuts or Filled Donuts! What do you like?
- Choose your favorite flavors
- Mix ingredients
- Decorate with many and many choices
- EAT IT! EAT IT AGAIN AND AGAIN!

Dozens to choose from:
- Flavors
- Decorations: Creams, frosting, fruits, chocolates, sprinkles, candies, all savory goods
- and More!!!!!

Play it for yourself. Who doesnt like to bake for the sweet tooth!

PLEASE NOTE:
- Awesome Donut Ice Cream Cake Breakfast Shop Maker is free to play but in app purchases charges real money within the app . You can adjust your device settings to deactivate in app purchasing.

Private Policy:
